title: 記者格立文（Terry Glavin) 喺加拿大Maclean’s Magazine 出咗篇文撐港

replies.msg:
The fight for a free Hong Kong isn’t over just because Canada wants no part of it

全文link: https://www.macleans.ca/news/world/the-fight-for-a-free-hong-kong-isnt-over-even-if-canada-acts-like-it-is/amp/

文章提到：
“If the world’s liberal democracies come to a consensus that Beijing has abrogated the Sino-British declaration, it follows that the liberal-democratic camp in the United Nations could no longer recognize the legitimacy of Beijing’s claim of sovereignty over Hong Kong. There is already a move afoot in the U.S. Congress to authorize the White House, at the president’s discretion, to recognize Hong Kong as an independent national state. There is also a corresponding viewpoint emerging among Hong Kong’s democrats that it’s either independence or total submission to Beijing.”

（如果世界上的自由民主國家就北京已廢除中英聯合聲明達成共識，聯合國的自由民主陣營將不再承認北京對香港擁有主權的合法性。 美國國會已經開始採取行動：授權白宮，由總統酌情承認香港是一個獨立國家。 在香港民主人士中，也出現了一種相應的觀點：獨立或完全服從北京。）

雖然講到好大，但係可以睇到香港獨立，喺外國唔係冇人理！524 大家做到個畫面真係好靚，而幾日外國嘅新聞同社論都仲講緊。大家要keep住個momentum！
杜仔仲死攬住華為快啲落台

replies.msg:
https://www.theglobeandmail.com/politics/article-conservatives-call-on-canada-to-organize-international-coalition-to/

當反對黨喺國會話要聯同其他民主國家撐港反共，最少唔好講而啲柒嘢：

“We have expressed in no uncertain terms our deep concern over the measures that were proposed by the Peoples’ Republic China in regard to Hong Kong,” Mr. Trudeau replied. “We stand with the people of Hong Kong who believes freedom expression, freedom of assembly an essential part of their way of life.”

「行」到同歐盟有得比
